sub_title: Scrum Master | DevOps Engineer | Mainframe Specialist | CSPO Certified
summary:
Currently, playing a dual role of Scrum Master and Dev-OPS Solutioning Engineer dealing with handling of solutions pertaining to interest calculations systems of the bank (ABN-AMRO).
•	Working with Tata Consultancy Services for ABN-AMRO Bank, as an Assistant Consultant for the past 5 years and 5 months.
•	Successful Scrum Master adept at managing scrum methodology adoption. 
•	Skilled at planning scrum integrations and maintaining relationships with stakeholders, playing the role of a back-up Product Owner.
•	A seasoned IBM Mainframe platform professional, with a total of 11 years of experience in I.T industry.
•	Having an experience of working at client location, at Amsterdam, The Netherlands (ABN-AMRO Bank) for a period of 1 year and 12 months in the role of Business Analyst.
•	Having a total experience of working with ABN-AMRO Bank since the past 7 years .
•	Having an experience of 4 .5 years with Syntel Ltd. as a Production Support Analyst and Mainframe Developer.
•	Having a complete knowledge of working in an Agile Way of Working including the traditional waterfall way of working.
•	Having an experience of working in an DEVOPS environment, was involved end to end for DEVOPS transformation of the team.
•	Worked extensively on Mainframes using COBOL, JCL ,VSAM and DB2 and also other technologies like SAS and other databases like Teradata.
•	Good knowledge of the Banking and Financial Services sector with 11+ years of experience working with a Fortune 100 Financial Services major (which Includes-AmEx Bank, ABN AMRO Bank).
•	Excellent communication skills and good analytical skills coupled with the ability to quickly embrace and understand new technologies.

awards.title: Received Syntel’s “SMART” award in Q4 2012 for excellence at work

projects.title: Amex:-Global Foreign Exchange Services(Development Project)
projects.description: Travel Financial System processes all the Travel Offices financial transactions. These transactions are the Money items collected from each Travel Office. The TFS system is fundamentally a Foreign exchange system and each Travel Office uses a Front Office system to capture the day’s business. At the end of each day, the travel office goes through a shutdown process, to set off a file transmission to Burgess Hill. The file is sent every evening to the Travel Office trade. Files are transmitted to downstream systems

contributors.headline: Scrum Master | DevOps Engineer | Mainframe Specialist | CSPO Certified

projects.title: Amex-Global Corporate Technology –Solution Delivery Maintenance (Production Support)
projects.description: This project dealt with Corporate Financial aspects of the client comprising of many Mainframe and Distributed applications handling this whole functionality. Mainframe applications include Millennium, Infogix ACR product, ABS (Asset Backed Securitization), Walker and Jets AUI. Various modules of Millennium are:-Purchase Order, Accounts Payable, Advertising and Promotion Expenditure Control System, Asset Management and Capital Markets.

profile_positions.description:

•	Motivated team members to continuously improve performance and meet ambitious goals.
